entities.description: Giving up or spending less time on important activities due to the use of prescription stimulants in the past 12 months.
Having serious problems at work, school, or home due to the use of prescription stimulants in the past 12 months.
Having arguments or other problems with family or friends caused by or made worse by the use of prescription stimulants in the past 12 months.
Use of prescription stimulants by the respondent.

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent gave up or spent less time on important activities due to prescription stimulant use.
Indicates that the respondent had serious problems at work, school, or home due to prescription stimulant use.
Indicates that the respondent had arguments or problems with family or friends worsened by prescription stimulant use.
Indicates that the respondent uses prescription stimulants.
The giving up or spending less time on important activities occurred within the past 12 months.
The serious problems at work, school, or home occurred within the past 12 months.
The arguments or problems with family or friends occurred within the past 12 months.
